ARABIC: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'This is just downright magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and say: “This is nothing but plain sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: it and say, "It is only plain magic".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “This is nothing but clear magic.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "This is nothing but evident magic!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: This is nothing but clear magic:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and they say, 'This is nothing but manifest sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: Lo! this is mere magic;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: this Qur'an is naught but magic manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and say, ‘This is nothing but plain magic!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And say, "This is nothing but evident sorcery!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they say: "This is nothing but evident magic!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and say: 'This is nothing but clear sorcery'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “This is nothing but plain magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:15] And they say, regarding it: ‘This is nothing but manifest sorcery — and they say in denial of the Resurrection —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say: lo! This) which Muhammad (pbuh) brought us (is mere magic) a manifest lie;
